meanings.definition: The state or condition of being public.
meanings.sent1: The publicness of the event made it easy for everyone to attend.
meanings.sent2: The publicness of the park allowed families to enjoy picnics together.
meanings.sent3: The publicness of the library made it a popular spot for book lovers.
meanings.sent4: The publicness of the announcement spread like wildfire through the town.
meanings.sent5: The publicness of the protest drew attention from all corners of the city.

meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being accessible to or shared by the general public.
meanings.sent1: The publicness of the information ensured that everyone had access to it.
meanings.sent2: The publicness of the exhibition attracted a diverse audience.
meanings.sent3: The publicness of the playground made it a hub for children to play together.
meanings.sent4: The publicness of the market place created a bustling atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The publicness of the event made it a community gathering for all to enjoy.
